results.title: Bongo's beat
results.brief_description: Bongo, a dopey dog turned bumbling super-hero attempts to solve the mystery of the missing dogs. Through luck rather than ingenuity, he stumbles across the villianous owner of a cat food factory.

results.title: Bert
results.brief_description: The state of Bert’s bathroom reflects his personal hygiene, both are totally disgusting. Bert wallows in his squalid ways until one morning the bathroom strikes back, startling him into unlikely action. Beware - Gross out humour a-plenty here
results.description: The state of Bert’s bathroom reflects his personal hygiene, both are totally disgusting. Bert wallows in his squalid ways until one morning the bathroom strikes back, startling him into unlikely action. Beware - Gross out humour a-plenty here

results.title: Beach party
results.brief_description: Two sisters begin a war of words after their mother gives one of them a new T-shirt bearing the slogan ‘Beach Party’. Magical transformations occur as they exchange taunts about each other’s appearance.

results.title: Autarky
results.brief_description: An exploration of the possibilities that the intergration of digital technology and the natural world can open up for women. Archetypal feminine symbols and themes suggest that resources for female empowerment and self-sufficency are to be found in the layers beneath the social construction of patriarchy
